content: the gap ssk over the gap k1 turn row 4 ws sl1 purl to 1 stitch before the gap p2tog over the gap p1 turn repeat row 3 & 4 until all sts have been worked 20 sts remain continue to gusset gusset knit the stitches on the turned heel on side of heel flap pick up and knit 1 stitch in each slipped stitch along the heel flap to avoid holes pick up one stitch between the feel flap and the top of the sock work row 10 over needle 2 on other side of heel flap pick up and knit 1 stitch between the top of foot and the heel flap then pick up and knit 1 stitch in each slipped stitch along this edge of the heel flap knit half of the heel turn stitches onto this needle needle 3 needle 1 & 3 should have an equal number of stitches round 1 on needle 1 k to the last three sts k2tog k1 on needle 2 work first row of faux cable pattern on needle 3 k1 ssk k to the end of needle round 2 needle 1 k on needle 2 work second row of faux cable pattern needle 3 k round 3 on needle 1 k to the last three sts k2tog k1 on needle 2 work next row of faux cable pattern on needle 3 k1 ssk k to the end of needle round 4 needle 1 k on needle 2 work next row of faux cable pattern needle 3 k repeat these rounds 3 & 4 continuing with the established faux cable pattern on needle 2 until needle 1 & 3 have 16 stitches each remaining continue to foot foot on needles 1 & 3 every round will be knit and needle two top of foot will be worked following the established faux cable pattern continue foot until length is about 1 5 shorter than the foot you want to put the sock on continue to the toe toe round 1 needle 1 k to the last 3 sts k2tog k1 needle 2 k1 ssk knit to the last three sts k2tog k1 needle 3 k1 ssk k to the end of the needle round 2 k repeat these two rounds until you have 16 stitches remaining knit the stitches from needle 1 onto needle 3 graft toe weave in ends and knit your second sock faux cable rib socks version 1 1 // page 3 of 3
